pages.text: For once, a hypothesis of mine was correct! A $(key)massive mushroom$() now stands before me where the ashes were scattered, and the ground around it has turned to $(item)mycelium$(). What is more, I can sense that this has $(key)turned some of the $(thing)Hypha$(key) nearby into $(thing)Lamella$(). I must investigate to see what else I can bring about with these $(item)ashes$().

pages.title: Mycelic Growth
pages.text: Grows a $(item)giant mushroom$(), surrounding its base with $(item)Mycelium$().$(br2)Cost:$(br)$(li)10 hypha$()
